' Used to send an email when someone posts a forum entry on the Projects site ' This method sends an email to the Project Owner and the original poster ' ' ' peter 05.02.2008 ' ' '=============================================================================== 'Me.dom.save(CCO.Server.MapPath("./logs/Forum.xml")) 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Start") Dim ForumID As String = Me.getProperty("source_id","") If ForumID="" Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Forum ID") Return Me End If ' fetch the project information and topic from Forum Entry Dim ForumItem = Me.newItem("CP_Forum","get") ForumItem.setID(ForumID) ForumItem.setAttribute("select","source_id,topic,author(email)") ForumItem = ForumItem.apply() If ForumItem.isError() Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Forum Query Failed " & ForumItem.getErrorDetail() ) Return Me End If ForumItem = ForumItem.getItemsByXPath("//Item[@type='CP_Forum']") If ForumItem.getItemCount() < 1 Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Forum Query returned no results") Return Me End If ForumItem = ForumItem.getItemByIndex(0) 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Found Forum item") Dim ProjectID As String = ForumItem.getProperty("source_id","") If ProjectID="" Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Project ID") Return Me End If Dim Topic As String = ForumItem.GetProperty("topic","") Dim Message As String = Me.GetProperty("message","") Dim ReplyAuthor As String = Me.getPropertyAttribute("author","keyed_name","") 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Reply Author is " & ReplyAuthor) Dim ForumAuthorItem = ForumItem.getPropertyItem("author") If ForumAuthorItem Is Nothing Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Forum author Item") Return Me End If Dim ForumAuthorEmail As String = ForumAuthorItem.getProperty("email","") ' get the Owner of this project Dim ProjectItem = Me.newItem("CP_CommunityProject","get") ProjectItem.setID(ProjectID) ProjectItem.setAttribute("select","keyed_name,author(email)") ProjectItem = ProjectItem.apply() If ProjectItem.isError() Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Project Query Failed " & ProjectItem.getErrorDetail() ) Return Me End If Dim Project As String = Me.getProperty("keyed_name","") Dim Owner = ProjectItem.getItemsByXPath("//Item[@type='Contact']") If Owner.getItemCount() < 1 Then Return Me Owner = Owner.getItemByIndex(0).getProperty("email","") If owner="" Then CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","No Contact item on CP_CommunityProject") Return Me End If 'CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("Forum","Contact for Project is " & Owner) Dim email As System.Web.Mail.MailMessage = New System.Web.Mail.MailMessage() email.From = "community@aras.com" If ForumAuthorEmail = "" Then email.To = Owner Else email.To = Owner & ";" & ForumAuthorEmail End If email.Subject = "Community Project Forum Posting: " & Project email.BodyFormat = System.Web.Mail.MailFormat.Html email.Body = "

Reply Posting by: " & ReplyAuthor & "


On the topic: " & Topic & "


The Reply is: " & Message & "

" cco.email.setup_smtpmail_server_and_send(email) Return Me
